question: Who has won the 2017 Swiss Indoors men's singles tennis tournament?
explanation: Roger Federer, a Swiss professional tennis player, has won the 2017 Swiss Indoors men\'s singles tennis tournament by defeating Juan Martin del Potro in the fiinal by 6-7(5), 6-4, 6-3 at the St. Jakobshalle in Basel, Switzerland. With this, he earned his 8th Basel title that led him to achieve his 95th career title. Now, Federer surpassed Ivan Lendl in number of career titles, only trailing Jimmy Connors, who owns 109 trophies.
